Primidon was a Netherese arcanist and inventor of fire-based spells who lived during the Golden Age of Netheril.
The fire mage developed five spells during their life. The spells they invented were flaming sphere in , flame arrow in , incendiary cloud in , pyrotechnics in , and lastly, burning hands in .
